discussion.content: D. Make sure you assigned a Financial Category of Accounts Payable to all your liability natural account values.

questions.question_text: When submitting the Payables to General Ledger Reconciliation report, the extract did not select any data. What should you check?

choices.D: Make sure you assigned a Financial Category of Accounts Payable to all your liability natural account values.
choices.C: Make sure you enabled the Reconciliation flag to all of your liability natural account values.
choices.B: Make sure you specified a Business Unit in the parameters when running the extract.
choices.A: Make sure you assign an Account parameter when running the extract to include liability accounts.

discussion.content: E. Enter a value in the Invoice Group field to group similar invoices into a batch.

comments.content: there is no Invoice Group Field in Oracle Cloud Payables FBDI

discussion.content:
C. Assign the same Invoice Header Identifier to multiple invoices you want to group.
https://docs.oracle.com/en/cloud/saas/financials/18c/fappp/invoices.html#FAPPP1138001

What's an invoice group?
An invoice group is a collection of invoices that the application uses as:

A parameter for the Validate Payables Invoice process

A parameter for some payables reports

One of the selection criteria for a payment process request

Note: If you enable the Require invoice grouping option on the Manage Invoice Options page, you must associate each invoice with an invoice group.

INVOICE_ID

Unique identifier for the invoice. You assign the same value to the invoice's lines in the AP_INVOICE_LINES_INTERFACE table to identify the data as belonging to the same invoice.

questions.question_text: You have a high volume of invoices to enter that have similar lines and do not require extensive validation. What must you do if you want to group multiple invoices in a batch during spreadsheet entry?

choices.D: Enable the invoice option Require Invoice Grouping, and the system automatically groups invoices entered in the same spreadsheet.
choices.C: Assign the same Invoice Header Identifier to multiple invoices you want to group.
choices.A: Make sure the Invoice Number is the same.
choices.E: Enter a value in the Invoice Group field to group similar invoices into a batch.
choices.B: Make sure all the invoice dates are the same.

discussion.content: B. Set the validation failure handling for payments to "stop process for review."

choices.A: Set the validation failure handling for documents to "show errors."
choices.C: Set the validation failure handling for payments to "show errors."
choices.B: Set the validation failure handling for payments to "stop process for review."
choices.D: Enable debug for the payment format program.

questions.question_text:
The payment build program has completed but with errors.
When submitting the payment process request, which processing option is used to review the error messages from the Manage Payment Process Request
Inquiry?

choices.E: Assign the Disbursement Bank Account to users to have the payment process default the bank account.
choices.B: Define the Disbursement Bank Account to the Payment Method in payment default rules.
choices.A: Define the Disbursement Bank Account at the business unit level to have the payment process derive the bank account.
choices.C: Define the Disbursement Bank Account to every supplier.
choices.D: Create a Payment Process Request template that includes the Disbursement Bank Account.

discussion.content:
A and D .
• If you use a payment process request template, a disbursement bank account and a payment process profile default from the template on to documents payable.
• Payments derives the missing disbursement bank account or payment process profile by looking at the usage rules, by business unit, and compares them to the attributes of each document payable in the payment process request.
Correct Answers are B and D

questions.question_text:
A company has a requirement to default the disbursement bank account when submitting a Payment Process Request.
Which action will accomplish this?

choices.B: You can export and import the allocation rules from the allocation manager.
choices.C: You can export and import the approval rules from the approval management engine.
choices.A: You can export and import the custom roles from Oracle Identity Manager.
choices.E: You can export and import selected business object services.
choices.D: You can export and import selected business units.

questions.question_text: Which two statements are true related to configuration package?

discussion.content: Answer : D & E. I checked into the application. It can be done at step 2 of export config package

D. You can export and import selected business units.
E. You can export and import selected business object services.
